xlsx_table

Several commands to be used with xlsx package

xlsx_table(wb, sheet, data, startRow = NULL, startCol = 1,
  col.names = TRUE, row.names = TRUE, columnWidth = 14,
  fontColor = "#FFFFFF", fontSize = 12, rownamesFill = "white",
  colnamesFill = "white", rowFill = c("white", "white"))

Arguments

wb

Workbook object
sheet

A sheet class object created by xlsx package (see example)
data

Dataframe class object
startRow

excel file starting row number (top left of table)
startCol

excel file starting col number (top left of table)
col.names

logical for using column names
row.names

logical for using row names
columnWidth

Width of column cells
fontColor

Excel font color
fontSize

Excel font size
rownamesFill

color for font background
colnamesFill

color for font background
rowFill

color for cell background in rows

Details

Package contains xlsx_table,

Examples
